Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>I came here to help clear out the
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>.

I want to help clear out the ruins that fell
smack onto the construction company's
workshop too.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>But President Hudson is yammerin' away
with someone, and I really don't want
to interrupt.
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice_00>Oh, hey! You're the guy I met at
the village!

I'm new in this area, so it's nice to see a
familiar face.
Greeting_Thunder_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>The thunder is noisy. It's makin' it hard
to focus.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Eh? You waiting for <clr:0000>President Hudson<clr:ffff>?


He looks just like how he's painted on the
<clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff> sign. Which helped
me figure out just who he is.
Then I saw him, but he was yammerin'
away, so I waited and, uh, fell asleep.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyhoo, a buncha <clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>and
other stuff fell smack on top of their
construction <clr:0000>workshop<clr:ffff>.
Heard they could use a hand getting
things back up and runnin', so I came
on out to help.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>But seems I'll have to keep waitin', since
Hudson's still at it...
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>You're the guy I met in the village.


I finally introduced myself all proper to
President Hudson.

<snd:TalkPositive_00>He told me they do need help, and it's
way more help than I anticipated!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Got some good sleepin' in, and ready
to do some heavy liftin'.

<snd:QuestionNormal_01>Are you here to help out too?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>If ya do, watch out for the <clr:0000>holes<clr:ffff> I made
while I was working. You could fall
right in...
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I came to help clear out the <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>
and ruins that fell all over the <clr:0000>workshop<clr:ffff>.
Heard they could use a hand.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>But I'm still pretty tired... Think I'll take another
little nap before I introduce myself.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So you got a chance to talk with
<clr:0000>President Hudson<clr:ffff>, huh?

I was just out here waiting my turn to go
chat with him.

But I...ended up falling asleep.


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I came to help clear out the <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>
and ruins that fell all over the <clr:0000>workshop<clr:ffff>.
Heard they could use a hand.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>But I'm still pretty tired... Think I'll take another
little nap before I introduce myself.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>You here to help out too?


I caught wind they need help clearing the
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> and debris, so here I am.

But, uh...you're kinda scrawny. Sure you
can help with all this?

The stuff keeps comin', so it's quite the
task. Grueling physical labor, y'know?

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you do help, though, watch your step
for the <clr:0000>holes <clr:ffff>I made when I was hauling
stuff out!
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The <clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>are neat, but I think
the ruins are even neater.

I've never seen anything like them,
have you? <sp:5:0:0>Feels like important work
happenin' here!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Oh, and be careful not to fall into those
<clr:0000>holes <clr:ffff>I made while I was working.
